verse:
परीक्ष्य लोकान्‌ कर्मचितान्‌ ब्राह्मणो निर्वेदमायान्नास्त्यकृतः कृतेन।
तद्विज्ञानार्थं स गुरुमेवाभिगच्छेत्‌ समित्पाणिः श्रोत्रियं ब्रह्मनिष्ठम्‌ ॥

terms.ब्रह्मनिष्ठम्: one who is established in Brahman.

meaning: Meaning:After thoroughly examining the materialistic world and its inhabitants engaged in action, a wise person realizes that there is no ultimate fulfillment or accomplishment through mere actions. Therefore, in order to attain true knowledge, such a person should approach a teacher who is learned in the scriptures and firmly established in Brahman, the ultimate reality.
